description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for Non-Material Amendments in connection with the planning permission (DC/15/92295) dated 18 May 2015 at land bounded by Oxestalls Road, Grove Street, Dragoon Road and Evelyn Street SE8, as amended by Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for Minor-Material Amendments (DC/21/122345) dated 7 November 2023, in order to:vary the wording of Conditions (24)(a) 'Performance of the Energy Centre' and (29)(c) 'Protecting Residential Properties from External Noise' (Plot 6 only).
site_name: CROWN AND NEW BALTIC, PARK AND BRIDGE AND VICTORIA WHARVES, BOUNDED BY GROVE STREET,  DRAGOON STREET AND EVELYN STREET, OXESTALLS ROAD, LONDON, SE8
